remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些裝置處理回傳的方式不同，因為這個方法可讓配接器來修改集合。Because some devices handle postback differently from others, this method allows the adapter to modify the collection. 和如果 post 要求來自不同的網頁，這個方法的實作會收集控制資料。The and implementations of this method gather control data if the post originated from a different page. 實作會執行 CHTML 特定處理的回傳資料。The implementation performs CHTML-specific handling of postback data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配接器可以處理的例外狀況，並顯示錯誤訊息。An adapter can choose to handle the exception and render an error message. 方法會傳回`true`如果它會處理錯誤。The method returns `true` if it handles the error. 如類別，這個實作不做任何動作，並傳回`false`。For the class, this implementation does nothing and returns `false`. 如類別，此實作中的 WML 格式錯誤，並傳回`true`。For the class, this implementation formats the error for WML and returns `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如類別，作用中的表單會轉譯為每個要求。For the class, only the active form is rendered for each request. 如類別，多個表單可以結合為卡到單一的投影片，如果允許的大小。For the class, multiple forms can be combined as cards into a single deck, if size permits.
